creator: OlympApp
descriptionHtml:
Olymp is a social app that helps to find new solutions in difficult 😓 psychological situations (relationship advice, marriage issues: divorce or break up). Get real ❤ emotions and have an 🎯 advice from other app users in a common or private way. All stories, comments and messages are FREE and ANONYMOUS.

WHO AM I?
I'm the only developer, the founder and the author of the project Olymp.
https://instagram.com/star.ivanov
https://vk.com/star.ivanov

WHAT?
• 📩 Leave anonymously your story
• 🎓 Сhoose anonymously the best advice or opinion from users or experts
• 🎁 Get anonymous supportive messages privately from those who want it completely free of charge

WHY?
➤ 💬 You can talk out or discuss anonymously with other members of community your situation or talk privately with those who are willing to hear out
➤ ☹ Feeling depression or anxiety, lonely or stress because of divorce, break up or troubles in marriage, relationship or lost love - leave anonymously your sadness here
➤ 💔 If you are sad being unliked - try this app to skip these problems: give anonymously someone a little ⛵ get more tomorrow 👑

DETAILS
Sometimes in life circumstances come that we do not expect and it seems that I should be where in another place at another time but no - I'm here right now. Meet lonely. It is at such moments that you want to turn into someone, do something incredible and find a secret in the hidden treasure chest of life. You can go to therapy or talk with friends, girlfriends, but not always for this there are forces. So I made this application, which is easy to install and it's easy to give something to another simply by clicking on the button. And if the forces suddenly wake up the worried heart, you can write your story, stress or depression. Give it to the world as a boring game, look at what happens through the prism of human emotional responses and amazing tips. From the point of view of a specialist, a look at the situation in all manifestations is called awareness of the situation. This is far from a magic pill, this is the first step in order to recognize some aspects and make, start planning life anew, on coals of not simple situations.

Are you an aspiring psychologist? Your direction is psychology, psych, psychotherapy in the field of cognitive-behavioral therapy, positive therapy, Gestalt therapy? Then try to help people here! Emotional intelligence develops by realizing emotions and giving them place.

*You can write story in room only English but you can use any languages in private chat
**If you feel *uicidal or high anxiety - please ask for help for therapists; there are no people in app to handle these so risky cases.

THEORY
Emotional self-regulation or regulation of emotion is the ability to respond to the ongoing demands of experience with the range of emotions in a manner that is socially tolerable and sufficiently flexible to permit spontaneous reactions as well as the ability to delay spontaneous reactions as needed. It can also be defined as extrinsic and intrinsic processes responsible for monitoring, evaluating, and modifying emotional reactions. Emotion self-regulation belongs to the broader set of emotion-regulation processes, which includes the regulation of one's own feelings and the regulation of other people's feelings.

FUNCTIONS
• 💬 Texting privately like dating game
• 💕 Collect the best discussions and new quotes in the tracker diary
• 🎁 Gift anonymously your heart balance to support people 💝
• 🔝 Raise up your situation on the 1st place to be viewed more
• ✋ Help people - share text-responses in an anonymous chat online
• ✅ Activate the subscription - make banner hidden and get 50% discount 😏
